short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is developed for usmd patients to share screen for doctors.It is just for showing reports to usmd doctors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is developed for usmddirect patients and doctors to share the screen for each other just for reviewing and discussing patient reports only.
